descriptionHtml:
Become The famous character: The Headless Horseman
You are on his tomb, and you can chose one of the three ghost horse (they are immortals/essentials)

Does a ghost will be the future Dovakhiin?
(The main quest is begin at the stage to go speak to Gerdur in Riverwood if you want.)

Installation: Open the .zip and copy the file in C:/(Yourname)/documents/Mygames/Skyrim/Saves (The names can be differents)

Know bugs: No

Mods used: No

Enjoy, ane endorse if you like.
author: Erwan66
